title: ./mvnw --file $(pwd)/./pom.xml broken since quarkus 3.7.1

labels.name: area/platform
labels.description: Issues related to definition and interaction with Quarkus Platform

body:
### Describe the bug

When we build a quarkus project with `quarkus-platform` version `>= 3.7.1` with the command
```bash
./mvnw --file "$(pwd)/./pom.xml" --errors clean package
```
we receive the following error:
```
[ERROR] Failed to execute goal io.quarkus.platform:quarkus-maven-plugin:3.8.1:generate-code-tests (default) on project qr-code-generator: Quarkus code generation phase has failed: Failed to initialize Quarkus Maven context: Failed to load current project at /eXchange/git/my-stuff/my-quarkus-samples/qr-code-generator/./pom.xml: Failed to load project /eXchange/git/my-stuff/my-quarkus-samples/qr-code-generator/./pom.xml -> [Help 1]

```

### Expected behavior

The project should build

### Actual behavior

We receive the stack trace mentioned above

### How to Reproduce?

- Take any project with `quarkus.platform` in version `<= 3.6.8` and run `./mvnw --file $(pwd)/./pom.xml clean package`
- Observe that the project compiles fine
- Upgrade `quarkus.platform` to version `3.7.1` an run `./mvnw --file $(pwd)/./pom.xml clean package`
- Observe that the project fails to compile

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

`Linux xxx 5.15.0-52-generic #58-Ubuntu SMP Thu Oct 13 08:03:55 UTC 2022 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux`

### Output of `java -version`

```
openjdk 21.0.2 2024-01-16 LTS
OpenJDK Runtime Environment Temurin-21.0.2+13 (build 21.0.2+13-LTS)
OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM Temurin-21.0.2+13 (build 21.0.2+13-LTS, mixed mode, sharing)
```

### Quarkus version or git rev
`>= 3.7.1`

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

```
Apache Maven 3.9.6 (bc0240f3c744dd6b6ec2920b3cd08dcc295161ae)
Maven home: /home/marco/.m2/wrapper/dists/apache-maven-3.9.6-bin/3311e1d4/apache-maven-3.9.6
Java version: 21.0.2, vendor: Eclipse Adoptium, runtime: /opt/java/mandrel/23.1.2.0-java21
Default locale: en_US, platform encoding: UTF-8
OS name: "linux", version: "5.15.0-52-generic", arch: "amd64", family: "unix"
```
### Additional information

- `./mvnw --file pom.xml clean package` works as expected
- `./mvnw --file ./pom.xml clean package` works as expected
- `./mvnw --file "$(pwd)/pom.xml" clean package` works as expected
